question:
You want to appear for an interview to an another city by train. The train departed late form the station and you could not reach in time. Write a letter to the railway officer of your city. In your letter :
* When you travelled and why the train departed late
* What happened as a result
* How you feel about the problem
text: I am writing to you to complain about a serious matter at the local railway station which costs me my new job.

Last week on Sunday, I had my interview for the post of probationary officer in Canara Bank and I had to travel to Delhi from Ambala Cantt. by train. However, I missed the final call due to the dispute which was held at the platform between the authorities and passengers. Owing to this, I was late by three hours.

I had prepared for this exam for a very long period and I am sure that I was one of the candidates to be selected for this vacancy. As I reached late,  I was not allowed to be interviewed and I missed the opportunity to secure my position.
I feel awful as my career was ruined due to my late arrival. I feel that all involved in the delay should be questioned and penalized in order to avoid this kind of mishappening in the future.
I hope this will awaken the management to serve the community in a better way.
